Package com.linecorp.armeria.client.pool

Interface KeyedChannelPoolHandler<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyedChannelPoolHandlerAdapter, KeyedChannelPoolHandlerWrapper, KeyedChannelPoolLoggingHandler
    public interface KeyedChannelPoolHandler<K>
    Handles the events produced by KeyedChannelPool.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void channelAcquired​(K key, Channel ch)
      Invoked when the specified channel has been acquired from the pool.
      void channelClosed​(K key, Channel ch)
      Invoked when the specified channel has been closed and removed from the pool.
      void channelCreated​(K key, Channel ch)
      Invoked when the specified channel has been created for the specified key.
      void channelReleased​(K key, Channel ch)
      Invoked when the specified channel has been released to the pool.
      static <K> KeyedChannelPoolHandler<K> noop()
      Returns an instance that does nothing.
